citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:14pm on 22-JUN-
22.
This inspector attempted unsuccessfully to contact the licensee via both, the telephone on file, and by text message.
Optimal hours for future inspections are to be discussed and re-established.
Additional Inspectors:
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:14pm on 22-JUN-
22. 
 
This inspector attempted unsuccessfully to contact the licensee via both, the telephone on file, and by text message. 
Optimal hours for future inspections are to be discussed and re-established.
